peregrine.os
Class FileMapper

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.util.IdempotentFunction<java.lang.Object,java.io.IOException>
      peregrine.util.IdempotentCloser
          peregrine.os.FileMapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable
public class FileMapper
extends IdempotentCloser
implements java.io.Closeable

Facade on top of mlock/mmap that opens up a file, mmaps it, then mlocks it (optionally).

Constructor Detail

FileMapper

public FileMapper(java.io.File file,
                  java.io.FileDescriptor descriptor,
                  long offset,
                  long length)
           throws java.io.IOException
Call mmap a file descriptor, then lock the pages with MAP_LOCKED. This will then prevent the pages from being swapped out due to VFS cache pressure.

Parameters:
descriptor - The file we should mmap and MAP_LOCKED
offset -
length -
Throws:
java.io.IOException
See Also:
IdempotentCloser.close()
Method Detail

getAddress

public long getAddress()

unlockRegion

public void unlockRegion(long len)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Unlock a region of the file from zero to 'length' bytes without unlocking the rest of the file. This can be used to unlock pages we've already read so the memory can be reclaimed by OS.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

getLock

public boolean getLock()

setLock

public void setLock(boolean lock)
